API_Description: An array specifying the language array search order for this document. The Spelling plug-in first searches for words in this array, then it searches the languages the user has selected on the Spelling Preferences panel. The user’s preferred order is available from `spell.languageOrder` . An array of currently installed languages can be obtained using the `spell.languages` property.
Product: Not allowed in Reader: Only available in Acrobat products
